brain_cache.rule: XP is not a score—it is 'Souls' (currency). Players spend XP at the 'Bonfire' (Shop) to purchase Consumables and Equipment that provide tactical advantages.
brain_cache.trigger: Designing the XP system and Shop
brain_cache.verification: User can open Shop and see items priced in XP, not unlocked by level alone.
brain_cache.red_flag: XP only affects a leaderboard or cosmetic badge.

brain_cache.rule: A one-time use item that restores HP. Allows more attempts at hard tasks. Must be purchased with XP or earned via perfect streaks.
brain_cache.verification: User buys Flask for 50 XP -> Uses it -> HP restored by X amount.
brain_cache.red_flag: HP regenerates passively without player action.

brain_cache.rule: A one-time use item that adds +5 minutes (or %) to a strict deadline. Provides breathing room on time-sensitive tasks.
brain_cache.trigger: User is about to miss a timed deadline
brain_cache.verification: User applies Green Blossom -> Task timer extends by 5 minutes.
brain_cache.red_flag: All deadlines are infinitely flexible with no cost.

brain_cache.rule: A one-time use item that triggers 'Focus Mode'—the AI automatically breaks the task into 3 smaller, easier-to-digest sub-chunks.
brain_cache.trigger: User feels overwhelmed by a large task
brain_cache.verification: User applies Resin -> AI splits 'Write 2000 word essay' into 3 x 700-word sections.
brain_cache.red_flag: Tasks are never broken down; user must manage complexity manually.

brain_cache.rule: A permanent passive item. The first missed deadline of the day costs 0 HP. Provides a safety net against early mistakes.
brain_cache.verification: User misses first deadline -> No HP lost. Second miss -> Normal HP penalty.
brain_cache.red_flag: Every missed deadline is equally punishing from start.

brain_cache.rule: A permanent passive item that increases Max Daily Task Limit. Allows power users to do more without hitting energy caps.
brain_cache.trigger: User wants to grind more tasks per day
brain_cache.verification: With Ring: User can attempt 10 tasks/day instead of 7.
brain_cache.red_flag: No limit on daily tasks; user can burn out infinitely.

brain_cache.rule: A permanent item that unlocks 'S-Tier' tasks—massive XP rewards but instant death on failure. For advanced players only.
brain_cache.verification: Without Greatsword: S-Tier tasks are greyed out. With it: S-Tier available.
brain_cache.red_flag: Hardest challenges are available to beginners without earning access.
